#include<algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int LongestIncreasingSubsequenceLength(int ar[],int n)
{
    vector<int>vec;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
         vector<int>::iterator it = upper_bound(vec.begin(), vec.end(), ar[i]);

        if(it==vec.end())// larger element
            vec.push_back(ar[i]);
          else *it=ar[i];
    }
    return vec.size();
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n); 
    int Ar[n+4];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)scanf("%d",&Ar[i]);
    int ans= LongestIncreasingSubsequenceLength(Ar,n);
    printf("%d\n", ans);
    return 0;
}
